requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7/8.1/10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: AMD / Intel dual-core (with hyper-threading) CPU, running at 3 GHz (AMD FX 4100 series or Intel Core i3-2000 series or newer architectures are recommended)
  • Memory: 4069 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA dedicated graphic card, with at least 2048MB of dedicated VRAM and Shader Model 5.1 support. AMD R7 265 and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or newer architectures are recommended.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse and internet connection for Steam
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: AMD / Intel quad-core processor running at 3.5 GHz (AMD Athlon X4 950 series or Intel Core i5 3000 series or newer architectures are recommended)
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA dedicated graphic card, with at least 2048 / 4096MB of dedicated VRAM (or more) and Shader Model 5.1 support. ATI/AMD Radeon HD 7870 and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or newer architectures are recommended.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse and internet connection for Steam
